summary: I love ice spike but it takes up so much magicka so i made a arrow that shoots three ice spikes at a time.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This is for people who cant decide whether they should use magic or archery and then the Ice arrows was made (Fire, and shock soon to come).

Location:
Theres one arrow on the breezehome chest in ur room (it may be on the floor check) or type help ice 4 and look.

(READ!)

Endorse:
I would greatly love if u guys gave a endorse if it was fun, SINCE HEARTHFIRE\'S COMEING OUT ON PC I WILL BE MAKEING A CASTLE WITH SOME HELP SO IF UR A GOOD TEXTURE PERSON MESSAGE ME AND WELL TALK ABOUT THE ARMOUR AND WEAPONS!
author: SaddyDog
